channel.title: Push (x) pull (y) - industry city sleepers [EDM? / Breakbeat]
channel.description:
https://soundcloud.com/icsleepers/push-x-pull-y
Fun facts: This started off as a drum and bass track. Decided to mess with tempo and scale after the fact. Not entirely sure what genre this is now.
This is also the first song I’ve ever written where I wish I could automate both the tempo and scale mid song. Could export twice and stitch it together but would be a nightmare on the phone.

item.title: Push (x) pull (y) - industry city sleepers [EDM? / Breakbeat]
item.dc:creator: Bassment_Chemists
item.description:
Yeah hopefully they add this in the new update

item.title: Push (x) pull (y) - industry city sleepers [EDM? / Breakbeat]
item.dc:creator: iammane
item.description:
Yeah my absolute favorite (used to do this in Reason a lot) was to put some thick delay on something then kind of use it as a drop by soloing instrument and rolling down (or up) tempo. It just gets this gross, droning, drifting sound it’s so awesome haha

Read full topic
